entries.journal_entry_description: Kivvaaa, the Myyydril settlement's patrol leader, has sent you to speak with Chief Kallaarac. She says he will have some tasks for you to complete.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Kivvaaa, leader of the Myyydril people's successful patrol unit, has told you to speak with Chief Kallaarac. He resides in the Myyydril village.
